exceptions.tactic: intros A B R_B J_B incr_B.
intros A' B R_B J_B incr_B.
intros A' B' R_B J_B incr_B.
intros A' B' R_B' J_B incr_B.
intros A' B' R_B' J_B' incr_B.
intros A' B' R_B' J_B' incr_B'.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce IncreasingSeparationAlgebra to an evaluable reference.
Cannot coerce SeparationAlgebra to an evaluable reference.

original: intros A B R_B J_B incr_B. unfold IncreasingSeparationAlgebra. intros worlds R J H. split. - unfold SeparationAlgebra in fun_SA. apply (fun_SA A B R_B J_B J). apply (incr_B worlds R J H). - intros n. destruct (residue_exists n) as [m RES]. exists m. split. + apply RES. + apply (incr_exists n). exists m. split. * apply RES. * apply (all_increasing m).
